abstract: Representative Jerrold Nadler of New York called Mr. Trump “the first and only president ever to declare himself unaccountable.”
lead_paragraph: In a broadside against President Trump’s pledge to stonewall “all the subpoenas” that Congress issued his administration, Representative Jerrold Nadler of New York, the chairman of the House Judiciary Committee, called Mr. Trump “the first and only president ever to declare himself unaccountable.”
